channel.title: instagram on Wilderness Prime
channel.description: Recent content in instagram on Wilderness Prime

item.title: Great Himalaya Trail - Reddit AMA
item.author: dave
item.description: I'm hosting a Reddit AMA. #reddit #ama #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.title: The Great Himalaya Trail vlog
item.author: dave
item.description: Every day I made a vlog video of the trek. I've finally got them ready to show the world. #vlog #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.title: Antarctica - Kit
item.author: dave
item.description: My kit list. #Kit #Gear #Antarctica #Ski #Mountaineering #Sailing

item.title: Antarctica - Tracking
item.author: dave
item.description: My satellite tracker will allow you to follow along and watch my progress. #Tracking #Antarctica #Ski #Mountaineering #Sailing

item.title: Antarctica - Updates
item.author: dave
item.description: I'll be posting regular updates from Antarctica. #Updates #InReach #Antarctica #Ski #Mountaineering #Sailing

item.title: Antarctica
item.author: dave
item.description: Sailing from the southern tip of Argentina to the Antarctic peninsula for a ski-mountaineering expedition. #Antarctica #Ski #Mountaineering #Sailing

item.title: Great Himalaya Trail - Day 126 - Never been so happy for a rickety footbridge
item.author: dave
item.description: Today we hiked from Thinmer (4,030 m) to Chap Chu (4,340 m). #vlog #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.author: dave
item.description: Today we hiked from Sipalun Kharka (5,210 m) to Thinmer (4,030 m). #vlog #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.author: dave
item.description: Today we hiked from Yalku Khola Kharka (4,760 m) to Sipalun Kharka (5,210 m) via Sime La (5,310 m). #vlog #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.title: Great Himalaya Trail - Day 123 - The path is blocked. No way forward. What do we do?
item.author: dave
item.description: Today we hiked from Sangda Phedi (5,130 m) to Yalku Khola Kharka (4,760 m) via Jungben La (5,550 m) and Niwas La (5,120 m). #vlog #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.author: dave
item.description: Today we hiked from Ghalden Ghuldun Khola (4,250 m) to Sangda Phedi (5,130 m). #vlog #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.author: dave
item.description: Today we hiked from Santa (3,780 m) to Ghalden Ghuldun Khola (4,250 m). #vlog #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.title: Great Himalaya Trail - Day 120 - Utterly spectacular scenery as we enter Dolpa
item.author: dave
item.description: Today we hiked from Kagbeni (2,810 m) to Santa (3,780 m). #vlog #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.author: dave
item.description: Today we hiked from Namu Kharka (4,180 m) to Kagbeni (2,810 m). #vlog #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.author: dave
item.description: Today we hiked from Tilicho Lake Base Camp (4,140 m) to Tilicho Lake Viewpoint (5,000 m). #vlog #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.author: dave

item.description: Today we hiked from Upper Pisang (3,280 m) to Manang (3,540 m). #vlog #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.author: dave

item.author: dave
item.description: #vlog #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.description: Today we hiked from Syabru Besi (1,500 m) to Gatlang (2,230 m). #vlog #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.author: dave

item.description: Today we hiked from Cho Oyu Base Camp (5,160 m) to Gokyo (4,790 m). #vlog #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.author: dave

item.description: #vlog #GreatHimalayaTrail #GHT #Nepal

item.title: Summer Haute Route - Part 8: Trient and back to Champex
item.author: dave
item.description: Our hike concludes, back at Champex. #chamonix #tourdumontblanc #tmb

item.title: Summer Haute Route - Part 7: Les Houches, Chamonix
item.author: dave
item.description: We continue through Les Houches, Chamonix and on to Argentiere. #chamonix

item.title: Summer Haute Route - Part 6: Refuge Des Mottets, Les Contamines
item.author: dave
item.description: Over the Col de la Seigne and into France towards Les Contamines.

item.title: Summer Haute Route - Part 5: La Fouly, Courmayeur
item.author: dave
item.description: Over the pass to Italy and down the valley to Courmayeur. #tourdumontblanc #tmb

item.title: Summer Haute Route - Part 4: Verbier, Champex
item.author: dave
item.description: Onwards down to La Chable and Champex.

item.title: Summer Haute Route - Part 3: Dix, Prafleuri
item.author: dave
item.description: Over the Pas de Chvres, Mont Blanc de Cheilon, La Cabane des Dix

item.title: Summer Haute Route - Part 2: Moiry
item.author: dave
item.description: Lac de Moiry and the Cabane du Moiry

item.title: Summer Haute Route - Part 1: Zermatt
item.author: dave
item.description: The first part of my journey from Zermatt along the Europaweg trail.

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 17: Tatopani to Ghorepani
item.author: dave
item.description: Easy navigation but an utterly exhausting trail up the never ending hill to Ghorepani, and beautiful Poon Hill. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 16: Ghasa to Tatopani
item.author: dave
item.description: A dangerous rock slide hampered our progress on the trail to Tatopani, ane we were exhausted by the end. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 15: Larjung to Ghasa
item.author: dave
item.description: Tricky navigation and real coffee on the road to Ghasa. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 14: Marpha to Larjung
item.author: dave
item.description: We battled gale force winds in the afternoon making our way to Larjung. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 13: Kagbeni to Marpha
item.author: dave
item.description: I'm glad we skipped Jomsom and headed all the way to picturesque town of Marpha. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 12: Muktinath to Kagbeni
item.author: dave
item.description: Kagbeni is a beautiful town, lush green fields against a desert background. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 11: Thorung Phedi to Muktinath
item.author: dave
item.description: The highest point of the trek at 5,400m and we're all feeling the altitude. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 10: Yak Kharka to Thorung Phedi
item.author: dave
item.description: The trail starts getting really tough as the elevation increases towards the pass. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 9: Manang to Yak Kharka
item.author: dave
item.description: My favourite evening of the whole trek in Yak Kharka, as snow starts falling. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 8: Braka to Manang
item.author: dave
item.description: The mysterious hidden cave of Milarepa eludes us, as we take a well needed rest day in Braka. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 7: Upper Pisang to Braka
item.author: dave
item.description: An amazing day hiking to Pisang as we start to get glimpses of the Annapurna range. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 6: Chame to Upper Pisang
item.author: dave
item.description: Spectacular scenery on the trail from Chame to Pisang. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 5: Dharapani to Chame
item.author: dave
item.description: Switchbacks and bridges as we pass Qunche and Danakyu towards Chame. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 4: Chamje to Dharapani
item.author: dave
item.description: Our first day hiking completely off the road, all the way to Dharapani. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 3: Bahundana to Chamje
item.author: dave
item.description: Fabulous Dal Baht and confusing side treks as we continue towards Chamje. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 2: Bhulbhule to Bahundanda
item.author: dave
item.description: After a late start to avoid the rain, we again take the easier path and don't regret it. #nepal #trekking #annapurna

item.title: Annapurna Circuit - Day 1: Besi Sahar to Bhulbhule
item.author: dave
item.description: The first part of our trek... We made the right decision in taking the easier path. #nepal #trekking #annapurna
